section.title: Warehouse Week
section.para: Warehouse weeks are used to define the days of the week when a Warehouse is open for business. For example, a production Warehouse may operate from Monday-Friday; whereas, the hours for a Shipping Warehouse may also include the weekend.

note.para: The Constraint Management system considers work week settings when calculating time buffers for Item Sites.

section.para: To define the work week for a Warehouse(s), select the "Warehouse Week" option. The following screen will appear:
When defining the work week for a Warehouse, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to create a blanket schedule for all Warehouses. Specify which days the Warehouses are open for business. Settings made using this option will be inherited by all Warehouses.

tip.para: After creating a blanket schedule for all Warehouses, you may then switch to the selected mode and modify the schedules for individual Warehouses.

listitem.para: Select the Warehouse whose work week you want to define. Specify which days the Warehouse is open for business. Settings made using this option are specific to the selected Warehouse.
